text: Colin McRae (5 August 1968 â€“ 15 September 2007) was a Scottish rally car driver. He was one of the best rally drivers in the world. He died with his son and two other friends when he crashed his helicopter near his home in Lanark, Scotland.Colin McRae dead ==References== Category:Accidental deaths in the United Kingdom Category:Aviation deaths Category:Scottish racecar drivers Category:1968 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Sportspeople from South Lanarkshire
